description:
Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to allow changes in the first floor and roof design, in pursuant to planning permission reference 216171FUL dated 21/12/2021 for'' Conversion of the existing property into four self-contained residential units, with associated cycle storage, refuse storage facilities and amenity space; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating two Juliet balconies and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope; single storey side/rear (wraparound) extension (following demolition of existing
outbuildings and front addition); first floor side/rear extension; alteration to side and rear fenestration; erection of boundary wall and fences alteration to front of property include involving hard and soft landscaping; alterations to the roof of front projecting element and partial demolition of single story front projection and chimney stack''
